stork.feather.util

Class Taps

  • java.lang.Object
    • stork.feather.util.Taps

  • public final class Taps
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for creating anonymous Taps for various purposes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Tap fromSlice(Slice slice)
      Create an anonymous Tap which emits a single Slice to an attached Sink.
      static Tap fromString(java.lang.Object object)
      Create an anonymous Tap which emits the string representation of an object encoded as UTF-8.
      static Tap fromString(java.lang.Object object, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Create an anonymous Tap which emits the string representation of an object encoded using charset.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • fromSlice

        public static Tap fromSlice(Slice slice)
        Create an anonymous Tap which emits a single Slice to an attached Sink. If slice is null, the returned Tap will initialize the attached Sink, but will not emit any Slices.
        Parameters:
        slice - the Slice emitted by the returned Tap.
        Returns:
        An anonymous Tap which will emit slice.

      • fromString

        public static Tap fromString(java.lang.Object object)
        Create an anonymous Tap which emits the string representation of an object encoded as UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to stringify and emit.
        Returns:
        An anonymous Tap which will emit object as a string.

      • fromString

        public static Tap fromString(java.lang.Object object,
             java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Create an anonymous Tap which emits the string representation of an object encoded using charset.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to stringify and emit.
        charset - the Charset to use for encoding.
        Returns:
        An anonymous Tap which will emit object as a string.
